name: WHElementaryMenuBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Menu Buddy what is for lunch today”
”Alexa, ask Menu Buddy what is for lunch tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask Menu Buddy what is for lunch this week”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: menu buddy
des: MenuBuddy reads the lunch menus for West Hartford CT public schools and then can speak them when commanded to. Menu information is available on a daily basis as well as a weekly basis. We will update the skill every month with the next month’s menu.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
